description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 1.30 of Section 73 Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme to make minor amendments to the definition of "Clitterhouse Playing Fields Improvements (Part 2)" and "Phase 3" to accord with changes approved under application 21/3709/CON (Approved 1 March 2022) pursuant to Condition 4.2 and Condition 4.4 for re-phasing and updates to the ICP. The changes proposed comprise those not captured within the associated approval pursuant to Condition 1.30 under reference 21/3807/BXE (dated 1 March 2022).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
